description: The SNMP trap is generated when the ring topology in the subscriber port is found.

event.Summary: Ring topology detected on subscriber port $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-RSTP-EXT-MIB::hwRingCheckPortRingTrap HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex i 0 HUAWEI-RSTP-EXT-MIB::hwRingCheckRemoteMACAddress s EXAMPL HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex i 0

description: The index of a shelf in the device.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex

description: A slot index is used to identify the location of a board in a shelf.
You can locate a board in a shelf according to hwFrameIndex and hwSlotIndex.
For the hwFrameIndex object, refer to hwFrameTable.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex

description: Port index, indicating the physical number of the port on a board.

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-RSTP-EXT-MIB::hwRingCheckXponPortRingTrap HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwOntIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-RSTP-EXT-MIB::hwRingCheckRemoteMACAddress s EXAMPL HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwOntIndex i 9999

description: The index of a shelf in the device.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex

description: A slot index is used to identify the location of a board in a shelf.
You can locate a board in a shelf according to hwFrameIndex and hwSlotIndex.
For the hwFrameIndex object, refer to hwFrameTable.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex

description: Port index, indicating the physical number of the port on a board.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex

description: ONT ID.
Parameters hwFrameIndex and hwSlotIndex are obligatory, hwOntIndex and hwPortIndex are optional
(the setting -1 indicates that the parameter is optional).
For example, to set the information of all ONTs connected to a specified port returned
you can set hwOntIndex to -1; to set the information about the status of all ONTs
connected to all ports of a specified slot returned, you can set hwPortIndex and hwOntIndex to -1
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwOntIndex

description: Indicates the remote Remote mac address.
